game.name: HYPNOSYNC
game.genres: Action, Indie, Simulation, Free To Play
game.categories: Single-player, In-App Purchases, Adjustable Difficulty, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Partial Controller Support
game.shortDescription: 리듬 x 최면. 당신은 새로 오픈한 음악 게임 아케이드, HYPNOSYNC의 강제 지배 매니저가 되었습니다! 새로 얻은 최면 능력으로 손님들을 비트에 맞춰 최면에 빠뜨리고, 그들을 당신만의 멍한 직원으로 만들어 버리세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: RHYTHM x HYPNOSIS. You are forced into being the manager of the brand new music game arcade, HYPNOSYNC! With your newfound hypnosis ability, hypnotize customers to the beat and turn them into your very own mindless employees!
